Memory.Card slot: microSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) - dual SIM model only

Main Camera.Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps, 720p@240fps, HDR, stereo sound rec., gyro-EIS, OIS

8 MP, f/1.7, 25mm (wide), 1/3.6", 1.22µm, AF
